name: Abby Ball's Fantastic Journey: Roll, Run & Jump
name_original: Abby Ball's Fantastic Journey: Roll, Run & Jump
description:
Abby Ball is a challenging physics-based puzzler complete with Retina display graphics, accelerometer controls, and an amazing soundtrack**. To be successful, you need to be clever and fast.

• 45 CHALLENGING LEVELS

The fun is just beginning. Keep Playing!

• MEET ABBY BALL!

She's cute, she's funny, she just wants to collect all the stars of success in the world. Guide Abby Ball over a series of platforms to collect stars and reach the exit before time expires.

• AMAZING LIFE-LIKE MOTION PHYSICS

Abby Ball can be rolled around by simply tilting your iDevice, and you can cause her to jump and hang in the air for a moment by tapping and holding. Very addictive new-style gameplay is for Labyrinth fans as though it looks like Angry Birds :)

• LOTS OF REPLAY VALUE!

• FEATURES LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS

For more information or support, please visit http://www.bazilsoft.com
Best Cool & Funny Games For Girls & Kids! Touch Top Fun!

** DON'T MISS OUR OTHER EXCITING APPS! **

GIFT THIS APP: Click the “Buy App” arrow on the iTunes® App Store



Music composed by Mike Weiser (ASCAP) www.mikeweisermusic.com, Sound design by Zach Dunham
